articles.title: PowerWash Simulator 2 Got a New Gameplay Trailer
articles.author: Anthony Franklin II
articles.summary: FuturLab is releasing PowerWash Simulator 2 in late 2025. The new version addresses player feedback by introducing features such as a scissor lift, abseiling, and a surface cleaner to improve the cleaning experience.

articles.title: Flip Ultra? Samsung Galaxy Unpacked July 9
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is anticipated to unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra and Galaxy Z Flip 7 at its Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9th. Rumored enhancements for the Z Fold 7 Ultra include improved durability, a revamped camera system, and enhanced performance, while the Z Flip 7 may feature display enhancements and a more functional cover screen. These new foldable devices aim to provide enhanced multitasking, innovative design, and improved portability.

articles.title: Behind the Booth: A creamy Canadian comeback story
articles.author: Anna Borowiecki
articles.summary: Joseph Dongo introduced Candelice, a creamy sauce and dressing, available in original and spicy flavors, at the St. Albert Farmers' Market. Made from Canadian natural ingredients and African spices, Candelice is sold for $7 per squeeze bottle and is intended to be a versatile pantry staple.

articles.title: Best Window Cleaning Robot: Tech Journalist Review
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Ecovacs has launched the Winbot W2 Pro Omni, an automated window cleaning robot designed for effortless cleaning of windows, mirrors, shower doors, and glass kitchen splashbacks. It features intelligent edge detection, customizable cleaning modes via the Ecovacs app, and adapts its cleaning patterns to fit different surface dimensions.

articles.title: MyDobi's latest outlet reflects brand's strong SE Asian presence
articles.author: BP 6
articles.summary: MyDobi, a self-service laundry operator, has opened its 97th outlet at Assar Commercial Centre in Miri, Malaysia. The new outlet, owned by Ekospin Sdn Bhd, features seven washing machines and 12 dryers. To celebrate the opening, MyDobi is offering free washes until June 28 through the 'Hiro' app, including free halal-certified detergent, sanitizer, and softener.

articles.title: Exploring Alternatives: Navigating the New World of Colors
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Givaudan introduces Sense Colour, a product designed to help businesses navigate the shift from synthetic colors to natural alternatives.

articles.title: Nissin launches new dill pickle Cup Noodles
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Nissin's Cup Noodles is introducing a new, limited-edition flavor to its product lineup. This expands the variety of instant noodle options available to consumers from the company.

articles.title: This Power Washer Is Under $200 Right Now
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Sun Joe is offering a portable electric power washer, model 2030, which is available at Target for $199, discounted from $269.99. The product features a dual-tank system and comes with multiple spray nozzles. User reviews highlight its effectiveness in cleaning various surfaces and its ease of use.

articles.title: CHEW ON THIS: COCKTAILS YOU CAN EAT!
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: Think Flavour launched PIMP MY PARTY, a new range of alcohol-free cocktail-inspired gummies, in June. The gummies come in four flavors: Brandy and Cola, Strawberry Daiquiri, Pina Colada and Passion Fruit Martini. The launch is supported by a digital campaign featuring social activations and tastings.

articles.title: YEEDI Launches S16 PLUS with Breakthrough BLAST Suction, Unveils Massive Prime Day 2025 Deals  Jun. 23, 2025 21:00
articles.summary: YEEDI launched the YEEDI S16 PLUS robot vacuum, featuring BLAST Airflow Suction Technology. The company is also offering Prime Day discounts on its product lineup, including the S16 PLUS, M12 PRO+, S14 PLUS, M14 PLUS, and C12 PRO PLUS.

articles.title: Arby's Launches Premium Angus Cheesesteaks
articles.author: Michael Carpenter
articles.summary: Arby's has launched a new product, the Arby's Cheesesteak, featuring a quarter-pound of thin-shaved Angus steak, melted American cheese, diced bell pepper and onion blend, and creamy garlic spread on a toasted bun. The cheesesteak is available for a limited time at participating locations nationwide.

articles.title: Next's £32 maxi dress called flattering and perfect for hot weather
articles.author: Nicole Haynes
articles.summary: Next introduced the Strappy Shirred Jersey Maxi Dress, retailing at £32 and available in black, cornflower blue, and khaki green. The dress features a straight neckline and shirred bodice, with customer reviews praising its comfort and easy elegance. New Look offers a Pink Lobster Print Maxi Beach Dress at £29.99 and Nobody's Child offers a Blue and Green Printed Olivia Midi Dress for £89.

articles.title: Mini pancakes with your choice of toppings offered at new pop-up venue
articles.author: Rett Nelson
articles.summary: Alexis Romrell launched "Hunny Cakes" on June 14, a new pop-up business serving mini pancakes with a variety of toppings and sauces, out of a cart at her Rigby home. They are planning future events including a summer kickoff event at the Mountain America Center in Idaho Falls. Romrell hopes to eventually have a food trailer at a permanent location.

articles.title: OPPO K13X: Price, Durability & Specs
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Oppo has launched new A Series smartphones, including the Oppo K13X, Oppo A5 Pro, and Oppo A5X models. The Oppo K13X features army-grade durability and an IP65 waterproof rating, priced at approximately 4,500 baht. The Oppo A5 Pro series is highlighted for its durable cable design and affordability, starting at 5,4XX baht, while the Oppo A5X is designed to withstand daily challenges with a sturdy build.

articles.title: Where savvy travellers find their ideal Singapore base
articles.summary: Far East Hospitality is promoting its serviced residences, including Quincy House Singapore, Village Residence Robertson Quay, Orchard Parksuites, Village Residence Hougang, Village Residence West Coast, Oasia Residence, Singapore, Adina Serviced Apartments Singapore Orchard, Orchard Scotts Residences, and Far East Plaza Residences. These residences offer various amenities and locations to cater to different needs, from business travelers to families, highlighting features like convenient locations, in-house facilities, and pet-friendly options.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 Design And Colors Revealed In New Leak
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: New renders reveal the design of Samsung's upcoming Galaxy Z Flip7 and the more affordable Z Flip FE phones.

articles.title: Inventions I Like To See
articles.author: David Friedman
articles.summary: Ketchup bottles are redesigned to rest upside down, incorporating a twist valve to prevent leakage. Fuel tanks on 1978 Triumph Bonneville motorcycles feature two taps at different levels, providing a reserve fuel supply.

articles.title: 23 Things Every Recent Grad Needs For The Adult World
articles.author: Celia Funderburk
articles.summary: Oxo offers a rapid coffee brewer for quick cold brew. Béis provides a work tote, and Bellroy presents a slim leather wallet. Eloquii introduces a stretchy blazer for comfortable professional wear. Roku launches the Express streaming device. Hatch offers a sunrise alarm clock, Beckham Hotel provides new pillows, and Sam Edelman offers comfortable loafers.

articles.title: The Xbox PC app might be the only app I ever use (sorry not sorry, Steam)
articles.author: Rami Tabari
articles.summary: Microsoft is updating the Xbox PC app to aggregate games from Steam and Battle.net. This update, currently available to Xbox Insiders with Windows 11 PCs and handheld devices, aims to make the Xbox PC app the primary gaming storefront for PC Game Pass subscribers. The testing stage is underway before the ROG Xbox Ally officially launches.

articles.title: WA Competition Shearing Association awards: Gail Simmons honoured with life membership
articles.summary: New Holland is highlighting the performance of its T8 series.

articles.title: WA Competition Shearing Industry Association recognises its top gun shearers and woolhandlers
articles.summary: New Holland is experiencing success with the performance of their T8 series, indicating an update or new launch in this product line.

articles.title: Tempt Fate (and Congress), Buy a New DJI Drone at Its Cheapest-Ever Price
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: DJI continues to sell its drones in the US market and is offering a deal on the DJI Mini 4K drone for $249 for Amazon Prime members. The Mini 4K features a 4K camera, a range of up to 10 kilometers, and a flight time of up to 31 minutes.

articles.title: Mountain Dew Dragon Fruit Review: This New Tropical Soda Is A Sugary Highlight Of Summer 2025
articles.author: Dani Zoeller
articles.summary: Mountain Dew launched its new Dragon Fruit soda, a limited-time offering available exclusively at Walmart starting June 15. The soda combines the classic citrus tang of Mountain Dew with the sweetness of dragon fruit, and it's sold in 20-ounce bottles and 12-packs of 12-ounce cans, priced at around $2.40 and $8.50, respectively.

articles.title: Fermax Duox Plus Cityline 5" Video Door Station
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: A new digital video door phone system has been launched, designed for modern homes and apartments. The system features high-quality video with a wide camera view, two-way communication compatible with VEO and VEO-Xs monitors, multi-language support, keypad access control, and a durable design. This system aims to enhance home security and convenience.

articles.title: I tried this minimalist phone and it was a weird experience
articles.author: Saeed Wazir
articles.summary: Mudita has launched the Kompakt, a minimalist phone designed to reduce screen time and enhance privacy. The Mudita Kompakt features a custom operating system without connections to major corporations, a hardware-level switch to disable connectivity, and basic functions like calls and SMS messages. This phone offers simplicity and a focus on privacy for users seeking to disconnect from their screens.

articles.title: Tech meets tradition at Dim Sum Bloom's new Bayside location
articles.author: Jessica Militello
articles.summary: Dim Sum Bloom expanded with a new location in Bayside. The restaurant uses a robot to prepare stir-fry dishes, aiming for fast service and consistent quality, while chefs handcraft soup dumplings. The new location features a modern dining area and is open seven days a week.

articles.title: This French skin-care brand just launched in Canada
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: La Rosée has launched in Canada. This represents a new brand offering within the Canadian market.

articles.title: A £9 tan mousse has beauty lovers ditching spray tans
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Bondi Sands' Liquid Gold Self Tanning Foam is being promoted as a must-have summer product. It's praised for its streak-free, no-rinse formula and ability to deliver an 'Aussie tan in no time'. The self-tanning foam is currently available at a reduced price.

articles.title: From fortune 500s to startups: Mayur Nagarsheth on empowering AI innovation
articles.author: Jon Stojan
articles.summary: Portend AI launched a platform that continuously monitors and assesses five core business risks: cybersecurity, supply chain, availability, reputation, and compliance. This AI observability platform is aimed at SMBs and venture capital firms, offering a unified risk profile and remediation steps.

articles.title: L'Oréal and CISL team up on €100m Sustainable Innovation Accelerator
articles.author: Stuart Stone In Paris
articles.summary: L'Oréal Groupe launched a Sustainable Innovation Accelerator in partnership with the Cambridge Institute for Sustainability Leadership (CISL). The company has issued its first call for applications for the new program.

articles.title: Aldi to open its second Staten Island store this week; info on giveaways, sweepstakes and more.
articles.author: Jessica Jones-Gorman
articles.summary: Aldi is opening a new store in Staten Island on June 26th, featuring exclusive brands, organic meats, fresh produce, and 'Aldi Finds'. The grand opening includes golden ticket giveaways for the first 100 customers and a sweepstakes for a $500 Aldi gift card.

articles.title: Basatne MENA and Likewize Launch Region's First Subscription-Based Handset Program: 'Upgrade & Protect'
articles.author: Access Newswire
articles.summary: Basatne MENA and Likewize have partnered to launch 'Upgrade & Protect', a subscription-based smartphone program in the Middle East. This program enables users to swap, upgrade, or protect their devices on a monthly basis, offering a new service model for telcos and aligning with ESG mandates. It is designed to combine sustainability, flexibility, and user experience.

articles.title: Dunkin' Is Releasing a New Summer Munchkins Bucket—And It's Perfect for the Beach!
articles.author: Mariah Thomas
articles.summary: Dunkin' is launching a Summer Munchkins Bucket filled with 50 classic Munchkins. The bucket, featuring a colorful design, is priced between $10 and $17 and is available starting June 25 at most locations, with some locations already offering it ahead of schedule.

articles.title: Nacon Revolution X Unlimited vs Turtle Beach Stealth Pivot – here's what I learned testing ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nacon Revolution X Unlimited and Turtle Beach Stealth Pivot demonstrate controller makers exploring new approaches in their products. These new controllers showcase innovation in the gaming peripheral market.

articles.title: Trump Mobile: Long on loud promises short on competitive pricing
articles.author: Globaldata Technology
articles.summary: The Trump Organization launched Trump Mobile, a themed mobile virtual network operator (MVNO) offering a single unlimited prepaid plan for $47.45/month. The service, which includes a potential gold-hued mobile device, has raised questions regarding its MVNO partner and the manufacturing location of its devices.

articles.title: Shake Shack unveils vision for former bank in Old Town
articles.author: James Cullum
articles.summary: Shake Shack is planning to open its first location in Alexandria this year, taking over the former Burke and Herbert Bank building. The company has filed permit requests for the location and seeks approval for new signage, including illuminated channel letters, a blade sign, and a burger logo. The new Shake Shack location will occupy over 6,100 square feet.

articles.title: PZ Cussons relaunches Carex in Nigeria to grow market share
articles.author: Seyi John Salau
articles.summary: PZ Cussons has relaunched Carex in Nigeria with a new master brand identity and an expanded portfolio of antibacterial solutions including bar soaps, handwash, and antiseptic liquids. The updated Carex products offer powerful antibacterial action, killing over one million germs in seconds, while also being kind to the skin.

articles.title: Early Prime Day deal: Beat the heat with 21% off this portable neck fan
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Amazon is promoting a portable neck fan with 360-degree cooling. The fan is bladeless, wearable, and cools down the user in three seconds. It has adjustable wind speeds and a battery that lasts between 4 to 16 hours.

articles.title: The Best Noyz Perfumes, Tested and Ranked by Cosmo's Beauty Team
articles.author: Jasmine Hyman
articles.summary: NOYZ, a new genderless fragrance brand, offers eau de parfums, perfume solids, and body mists in uniquely designed bottles. The brand has launched campaigns featuring celebrities and won a Cosmo Holy Grail Award for Best New Perfume Brand.

articles.title: 51 Alternatives To More Expensive Products You'll Love So Much, You May Shed A Tear
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article highlights the launch of numerous affordable alternatives to popular and often expensive products. These new offerings span various categories, including beauty products like Essence's Lash Princess Mascara as a budget-friendly option, fashion items such as a Skims-like loungewear set, and home goods like a Le Creuset-inspired Dutch oven. Additionally, the article features a new Petcube pet camera as an alternative to the Furbo.

articles.title: Swee Heng Introduces More Toast & Roll Locations Islandwide  Jun. 23, 2025 15:00
articles.summary: Swee Heng Group is expanding its Toast & Roll bakery concept with several new outlets opening across Singapore in 2025. The company is also launching a new loyalty app integrating rewards and payment functions across all Swee Heng brands to streamline customer experience and encourage greater engagement.

articles.title: Next's £48 maxi dress is 'just right for summer' and 'looks expensive'
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next is offering a new 'Pink/Red 100% Cotton Textured Tiered Gingham Maxi Dress' for £48, featuring a seersucker texture, tiered hem, and rikrak detailing. New Look also has a Black Gingham Check Strappy Midi Dress on sale for £26.24.

articles.title: Sansone Jr's Auto Group Expands with Grand Opening of Keyport Kia
articles.author: Sansone Jr's Auto Group
articles.summary: Sansone Jr's Auto Group has opened Sansone Jr's Keyport Kia, a new dealership in Keyport, New Jersey. This location aims to enhance customer service through a modern facility and improved service options, including online service scheduling and express service.

articles.title: Thread by @HeyGen_Official on Thread Reader App
articles.summary: HeyGen launched "Product Placement", a feature enabling creators to generate ads and UGC reviews using one product photo and one avatar. This empowers the community to make advertisements effectively, from full-blown perfume ads to quick UGC reviews.

articles.title: M&S shoppers loving summer liqueur flavour that's 'taste of the Amalfi coast'
articles.author: Jess Flaherty
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer (M&S) has launched a new Limoncello Liqueur, priced at £13 for a 50cl bottle. This vegan-friendly liqueur, crafted with Italian lemon peels, is promoted as a key ingredient for summer cocktails and is available at M&S stores and through Ocado. The launch has garnered positive responses from consumers on social media.

articles.title: Best cordless vacuum cleaners of June 2025 with powerful suction and extended battery life
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: A new range of cordless vacuum cleaners combines powerful suction with long-lasting battery life. These vacuums offer tangle-free cleaning.

articles.title: Olive Garden Just Released 3 New Products We Need ASAP
articles.author: Bailey Fink
articles.summary: Olive Garden is launching a new line of summer products, including Floatin' Fettuccine, Takin' It Easy Tortelloni, and Relaxin' Rigatoni pool floats inspired by their pasta dishes. The pasta pool floats will be available for purchase on Olive Garden's website starting June 30th for $40, which includes a choice of a Breadsticks Bucket Hat, Soup-er Summer Vibes Tote Bag, or Lettuce Chill Floating Drink Holder.

articles.title: 41 Genius Practical Products To Make Your Life Easier
articles.author: Buzz Feed
articles.summary: The article reviews various products, including the Rocketbook, which allows users to reuse pages and save paper; the Litter Robot, which automatically collects waste; a chopper which simplifies food preparation and a bagel slicer with safety features. These reviews highlight features and benefits.

articles.title: Amazon handheld fan 'perfect for humid and sticky British summer heat'
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a Portable Handheld Fan for £16.99 with an 11% discount, featuring a rechargeable battery and portable charger function. John Lewis offers the ANYDAY Handheld and Foldable Desk Fan for £12, while Dunelm provides a budget-friendly 3 Inch Dual Position Handheld Folding Fan for £3. These fans cater to diverse needs, offering portability, desk use, and various features like built-in torches and multiple colors.

articles.title: Personalization at Scale, Creativity at Speed
articles.author: Debbie Abrams Kaplan
articles.summary: Nestlé is developing an AI infrastructure to implement tools for content creation, automation, and adaptation in its marketing across 188 markets. MAC Cosmetics is using AI to ensure a consistent brand image and voice across its territories. Adobe provides AI tools which enables Nestlé to personalize marketing campaigns, tailoring visuals and messages to different consumer groups.

articles.title: YEEDI Launches S16 PLUS with Breakthrough BLAST Suction, Unveils Massive Prime Day 2025 Deals
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: YEEDI launched its most powerful robot vacuum, the YEEDI S16 PLUS, featuring BLAST Airflow Suction Technology. This new flagship model is part of YEEDI's premium S Series. Additionally, YEEDI is offering Prime Day discounts on its entire product lineup, including the M12 PRO+, S14 PLUS, M14 PLUS and C12 PRO PLUS.

articles.title: Grid Dynamics Announces AI-Powered Engagement Model Enabling Accelerated Business Transformation for Fortune 1000 Enterprises
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Grid Dynamics launched an AI-powered engagement model for software engineering services. This model aims to improve agility, quality, and time-to-market for Fortune 1000 enterprises. It expands Grid Dynamics' engagement offerings beyond traditional models.

articles.title: Lunchtime just got better: Meet the new Stanley All Day Mini Lunch Box
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: Stanley is launching the new Stanley All Day Mini Lunch Box on June 24, priced at $45. The lunch box is designed to keep meals fresh and is available in various colors. The product will be available for purchase on Stanley1913.com.

articles.title: Ushur Launches Ushur Intelligence: Agentic AI Purpose-built for Highly Regulated Enterprises
articles.summary: Ushur has launched Ushur Intelligence, an AI-powered Customer Experience Automation platform designed for healthcare, insurance, and financial services. This new product offers AI Agents that automate complex workflows while ensuring security, compliance, and control. Ushur Intelligence delivers industry-specific digital experiences through proprietary language models trained on customer behavior.

articles.title: Summer Body Mists: Best Scents for Warm Weather
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Several companies are releasing new body mists. Phlur is offering Vanilla Nectar, Glossier has a Hair & Body Mist, Ouai presents St. Barts Hair & Body Mist, and Sol De Janeiro features Água Mística Hair & Body Perfume Mist. These body mists offer lighter, versatile fragrance options suitable for various uses including hair and skin application.

articles.title: The Art Of Risk: Balancing Vision With Viability
articles.author: Vikram Joshi
articles.summary: Airbnb tested their service in a handful of markets before launching broadly, focusing on quality and user feedback to refine their business model. pulsd launches ad campaigns with a small initial budget and assesses the return on investment (ROI) before deciding whether to scale up or shut them down. Both companies showing calculated risk in new product or service launch or feature introduction.

articles.title: What's next for AdTech? Malika Kennedy on real shifts behind the buzzwords
articles.author: Gulf Business
articles.summary: Yango Ads utilizes AI-powered tools and machine learning to optimize advertising campaigns, including rapid iteration on creative concepts. They are also assisting retailers in the UAE, some with 50+ years of experience, to unlock the value of their data and digital revenue streams through retail media integrations, bridging traditional and digital advertising strategies.

articles.title: Samsung aims to catch up to Chinese rivals for thin foldable phones as Apple said to enter the fray
articles.author: Arjun Kharpal
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold6 at its Galaxy Unpacked event in Paris. This foldable device is designed to be thinner and lighter than previous models. The launch comes as Samsung faces competition from Chinese rivals like Honor and Oppo, who are also focusing on creating slim foldable phones.

articles.title: 44 Products With Before And After Pics So Unbelievable, I'm Convinced Witchcraft Was Involved
articles.author: Jenae Sitzes
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream. Cosrx launched a lightweight snail mucin essence.  Bissell released the Little Green machine, a portable cleaner for upholstery and carpets.

articles.title: Best cordless vacuum cleaners of June 2025 with powerful suction and extended battery life
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: Several companies including KENT, AGARO, Dyson, Eureka Forbes, DREAME, Tineco, and ILIFE have introduced new cordless vacuum cleaners with different specifications, such as motor power, suction power, and battery runtime. The models, available in June 2025, include features like HEPA filters, multiple cleaning modes, and lightweight designs, catering to various cleaning needs for homes with pets or allergy sufferers.

articles.title: 42 Products To Switch Your Life Into 'Easy Mode'
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: Several innovative cleaning and convenience products are introduced, designed to simplify household tasks.  These include a Scrubbing Bubbles toilet cleaning stamp, Bottle Bright tablets for bottle cleaning, and Bissell Stomp 'n Go stain lifting pads. Additionally, FryAway offers a solution for solidifying cooking oil, and the Beachwaver B1 Rotating Curling Iron automates hair curling.

articles.title: Vang: The viral Lululemon 2-in-1 dress and what it says about today's expectations for working women
articles.author: Ka Vang
articles.summary: Lululemon launched a 2-in-1 dress that functions as both a dress and a skirt, retailing for $148. The dress is marketed as a versatile garment for the modern working woman, suitable for various occasions. However, it's also viewed critically as representing the pressure on women to be adaptable and multi-functional.

articles.title: Top 10 8kg washing machines in June 2025 worth checking if you want a balance of space, speed, and value
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: In June 2025, several companies introduced or highlighted their 8kg washing machines. LG features a front-load with Direct Drive and Wi-Fi, while Samsung offers a top-load with Eco Bubble technology. Other brands such as Bosch, IFB, Godrej, Whirlpool, and Panasonic provide various front-load and top-load models with features like AI, steam wash, and zero-pressure technology, aimed at different consumer needs.

articles.title: The Truth About ‘Fragrance-Free' (Unscented) Baby Products: What No One Tells You
articles.author: Daily Excelsior
articles.summary: Mother Sparsh launched a 'simply unscented baby skincare range' including baby wipes, sunscreen, lotion, face cream and wash, designed with gentle and natural ingredients like oatmeal. The products are formulated to nourish and protect babies' skin without synthetic fragrances, irritants, or chemicals, emphasizing simplicity and safety.

articles.title: Next's 'very classy' £38 dress is 'very flattering' on waist and tummy
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next is offering the Jersey Waisted Summer Dress for £38 in various colors and sizes. The dress is made from soft jersey fabric, featuring a square neckline, side pockets, and waist detailing and is machine washable. The dress has received positive reviews, with customers praising its fit, style, and comfortable material.

articles.title: The Third Wave: AI And Web3 Are Changing Commerce At Amazon & QVC
articles.author: Sandy Carter
articles.summary: Edge Video AI launched a platform to turn any video stream into a living, breathing storefront. The platform uses AI to match relevant products to what's happening on screen, allowing viewers to purchase items directly from the video. Edge Video AI is already live with Intravel and DangerTV, and is rolling out across two major national media networks and five regional or mid-sized broadcasters.

articles.title: LG's Cordzero™ A9 Vacuum Range is the Ultimate Summer Ally for a Fresh, Dust-free Home
articles.summary: LG Electronics is promoting its CordZero™ A9 vacuum cleaner range, which includes various models like the A9T-LITE (a self-emptying stick vacuum), A9 Core (with Smart Inverter Motor™), A9L-SLIM (lightweight design), and A9T Ultra (with an all-in-one tower). The A9T Ultra model includes an innovative all-in-one tower, which not only charges the vacuum, but automatically empties the dustbin, eliminating direct contact with dust.

articles.title: Sansone Jr's Auto Group Expands with Grand Opening of Keyport Kia
articles.author: Darrel Hoosline
articles.summary: Sansone Jr's Auto Group has opened its newest dealership, Sansone Jr's Keyport Kia, in Keyport, NJ. The new 30,000 square foot facility features 20+ high-tech service bays, a customer-friendly lounge, a full lineup of new Kia vehicles, and in-house lending options and aims to deliver outstanding customer care and a streamlined car buying experience.

articles.title: Next's 'very flattering' £38 summer dress is 'ideal for holiday'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next is offering a new product, the Jersey Waisted Summer Dress, priced at £38. It is available in multiple colors and sizes, featuring soft jersey fabric, a square neckline, side pockets, and waist detailing. The dress has received mostly positive customer reviews, praising its fit, style, and fabric.

articles.title: Next's 'very flattering' £38 maxi dress is 'great for travelling'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next introduced the Jersey Waisted Summer Dress, retailing at £38 and available in multiple colors and sizes. The dress features a square neckline, side pockets, and waist detailing, and has received largely positive reviews from customers praising its fit, style, and fabric, though some criticisms regarding the material's weight and transparency have been noted.

articles.title: Madhav Seth-backed AI+ unveils its first smartphone duo in India
articles.summary: AI+ has launched two new smartphones, the Pulse and Nova 5G, in India. The Nova 5G supports 5G connectivity, while the Pulse model is designed for everyday tasks. Both devices feature a dual rear camera setup with a 50MP main sensor and are available in five colors exclusively on Flipkart.

articles.title: Samsung's AI-powered Bespoke appliances launching in India on June 25
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its 2025 Bespoke AI appliance range in India on June 25, featuring refrigerators, washing machines, washer-dryer combos, and air conditioners. The new lineup includes advanced AI capabilities and personalized features like AI Wash in washing machines and AI-powered climate control in air conditioners designed for Indian households.

articles.title: I tested 5 AI logo generators — here's what surprised me
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: The article reviews multiple AI-powered logo generator tools, testing their ability to create professional logos based on a fictional brand. Turbologo experts tested the tools. The evaluation focused on interface intuitiveness, design variety, and usability across different formats, finding that while AI can be a useful starting point, manual refinements are often necessary for a polished final product.

articles.title: Meghan Markle's latest move in yet another awkward royal clash
articles.author: Lauren Welch
articles.summary: Meghan Markle is launching a new product next week. She has already debuted her wine bottle on Instagram. The intention is to ensure her product is consistently available.

articles.title: Introducing AI+ Nova 5G and AI+ Pulse
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: AI+ Smartphones has unveiled two new smartphones designed for the Indian market: AI+ Nova 5G and AI+ Pulse. AI+ Nova 5G focuses on high-speed performance, while AI+ Pulse emphasizes smooth, everyday functionality, both featuring a dual 50MP rear camera. These models will be available exclusively on Flipkart.

articles.title: Heading to Myrtle Beach? Here's where to find NY-style bacon, egg & cheese
articles.author: Elizabeth Brewer
articles.summary: NY Deli, Kaminsky's Deli, Bagel Factory, Leone's Italian Deli, and Quagliata Brothers Italian Deli offer a variety of breakfast sandwiches. Bagel Factory features variations like sausage, turkey bacon, pork roll, pastrami, steak, and ham with egg and cheese. Leone's Italian Deli serves 'The Gator,' while Quagliata Brothers Italian Deli offers 'The Long Island.'

articles.title: 'If there is a God in design, he's probably called Jony Ive'
articles.author: Nicolas Roope
articles.summary: OpenAI has invested $6 billion in Jony Ive's hardware company, io, to explore the creation of new AI-powered devices. This move aims to leverage Ive's design expertise to develop innovative products and maintain a competitive edge in the rapidly evolving AI market, with the potential to revolutionize user interaction with AI technology.

articles.title: Philips 6.2L air fryer with viewing window nearly half price at Amazon
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Philips is offering a limited-time deal on its new 2000 Series air fryer, available on Amazon. The 6.2L version, featuring RapidAir technology, 13 functions, a touch-screen display, and a cooking window, is currently discounted by 48% at £51.79. Philips also offers other air fryer models from its 1000 and 2000 series with different capacities and discounts.

articles.title: Bath & Body Works Vs The Body Shop: Which Brand Offers The Best Skincare Products?
articles.summary: The Body Shop offers a British Rose shower gel with a vegan formulation and sustainably-sourced products, a Vitamin C moisturizer with 24-hour hydration, and a tea tree toner for acne-prone skin. Bath & Body Works provides a lavender and vanilla body wash with natural oils, a mahogany teakwood body spray for men, and an Into The Night body lotion with shea butter and coconut oil.

articles.title: TRIOOH launches to revolutionize OOH advertising with data-first, Intelligence-led approach
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: TRIOOH, a new Out-of-Home (OOH) advertising agency founded by Anuj Bhandari, has launched with a focus on technology-led and data-driven strategies. The agency specializes in media planning, buying, execution, and experiential events, aiming to provide actionable insights and measurable impact for brands.

articles.title: Reviewers Over 50 Love These 28 Products And, Yes, You Probably Will Too
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The article showcases an array of newly introduced or updated products, focusing on their functions and benefits. These include teeth-whitening pens, tightening cream, compression gloves and socks, shower spray, yoga blocks, hair oil, weeding tools, breast pillow, facial hair trimmer, dermaplaning razors, nail concealer, grape cutter, veggie chopper, moisturizing hair treatment, sandals, kegel weights, flossing toothbrush, skinny jeans, moisturizing cream, anti-humidity spray, gnat trap, washing machine cleaning tablets, eye cream, earplugs, mattress lifter, cooling pillows and travel pillow.

articles.title: Business News  India's First AI-Powered Digital Marketing Agency Hust'l Redefines the Future of Branding, Lead Generation, & Growth
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Hust'l Media, an AI-powered digital marketing agency, has launched its next phase, integrating AI with creative thinking and data strategies. The company offers AI-driven services, including AI for lead generation, AI in advertising, and data-driven marketing. These services have already delivered engagement boosts and measurable business outcomes for their clients.

articles.title: Top 10 washing machine deals on Amazon: Up to 43% off on Samsung, LG and more
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: Amazon is offering deals on washing machines from brands like LG, Samsung, Whirlpool, Bosch, and Godrej. The sale includes fully automatic and semi-automatic models with features like AI technology, steam wash, and inverter technology, catering to different household needs and budgets.

articles.title: Huawei, Industry partners win four prizes at the World's first new calling x AI challenge
articles.summary: Huawei and its partners received awards for successful 5G-A and AI integrated applications within the 'New Calling x AI Challenge'. New Calling services, including Visualized Voice Calling and Real-Time Translation, are being commercially adopted across various regions, transforming operator business models from voice-only to content operations. Huawei is collaborating to foster innovation and growth in the New Calling industry, exploring how AI can reshape telecom services.

articles.title: From Intrusive to Intuitive: How AI is redefining customer engagement
articles.author: Brand Connect Initiative
articles.summary: BankBazaar is utilizing AI to develop visual, functional mockups, reducing development time by up to 80%. Indian Bank has reimagined lending with a GST-based working capital product, offering instant loans based on customer turnover. Royal Sundaram General Insurance focuses on meeting precise customer intent, exemplified by Zepto's 15-minute water heater delivery.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 looks extremely slimmer than Fold 6 in new tipped images
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing the launch of its new foldable phone, the Galaxy Z Fold 7. Leaks about the foldable have begun circulating as anticipation builds for the official global launch.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 launching in India on 8 July: Expected price, specs and more
articles.author: Aman Gupta
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus Nord 5 and OnePlus Nord CE 5 smartphones in India at the Summer Launch event on July 8. The OnePlus Nord 5 is expected to feature a 6.83 inch 1.5K AMOLED display with up to 144Hz refresh rate, a 50MP primary camera, and a 6,700mAh battery with 80W fast charging.

articles.title: Intel's Attack Mode: Turnaround Strategy Shift
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Intel is launching its Gaudi 3 AI accelerator kit, including eight accelerators, priced at approximately $125,000, lower than NVIDIA's comparable systems. The competitive pricing has the potential to disrupt the AI market by offering a cost-effective alternative, incentivizing enterprises to diversify their hardware suppliers. Intel is re-entering into GPU market with focus on Arc graphics cards.

articles.title: Next's new floaty dress is 'elegant' and perfect for holidays
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Next has launched a new linen-blend halterneck maxi dress priced at £34 (solid colours) or £46/£49 (printed styles). The dress is available in four colors and sizes 6-26. New Look also offers a green satin halterneck dress priced at £35.

articles.title: Can Nu Skin Enterprises (NYSE:NUS) Maintain Its Place Alongside NYSE Composite Leaders?
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Nu Skin Enterprises focuses on combining hardware with consumable products in its skincare offerings, highlighting devices like ageLOC LumiSpa alongside topical skincare lines such as Nutricentials. The company also manages seasonal and region-specific product offerings tailored to lifestyle preferences, distributed through digital platforms and affiliate networks.

articles.title: 20 Game-Changing AI Tools Every Small Business Leader Needs Now
articles.author: Forbes Tech
articles.summary: Small businesses can leverage AI tools for various tasks like marketing and customer service. Adobe Express, powered by genAI and Firefly AI, assists in creating marketing materials. These AI tools position small businesses to compete in the digital marketplace.

articles.title: புதிய விற்பனை மைல்கல்லை எட்டிய டிவிஎஸ் என்டார்க்.. புது மாடல் ஒன்னும் வருது!
articles.summary: TVS Ntorq has achieved a new sales milestone. A new Ntorq model is also in development, suggesting a potential future product launch.

articles.title: Motorola Ultra vs. Samsung S25 Ultra: Screen, Battery, & Price!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Motorola is introducing the Motorola Ultra smartphone, challenging Samsung's dominance in the premium Android market. This new phone offers competitive specifications, potentially lower prices, and a focus on screen technology and battery life. This launch signals a broader trend of smartphone price wars, pushing other manufacturers like Samsung to innovate or adjust their pricing strategies.

articles.title: Ai+ Smartphones Design And Colours Officially Revealed, Madhav Sheth Confirms Launch Of The Smartphone
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: NxtQuantum Shift Technologies, led by Madhev Sheth, will launch the Ai+ smartphone in India in July 2025. The Ai+ phone will be sold via Flipkart and features a dual rear camera setup with a 50MP AI camera, and will be available in five colors. The new smartphone brand was established to deliver a smartphone which is entirely designed, engineered, and manufactured in India.

articles.title: Ai+ NOVA 5G, Pulse: Former Realme CEO Confirms Launch Of New Smartphones
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: NxtQuantum Shift Technologies, led by Madhev Sheth, showcased the design of its upcoming Ai+ NOVA 5G and Ai+ Pulse smartphones in India, scheduled for launch in July 2025. These phones feature a 50MP dual rear camera and will be sold via Flipkart.

articles.title: Nothing Headphone 1 Quirky Design Leaked And People Are Now Confused
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Nothing is launching its first headphone model, the Nothing Headphone 1, in July along with the Phone 3. The Headphone 1 features a transparent design and is expected to be available in the Indian market. It aims to offer top-tier sound quality at a more accessible price point.

articles.title: 삼성전자, 태국 방콕 ‘2025 동남아 테크 세미나'서 비스포크 AI 가전 선봬
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics introduced its new Bespoke AI home appliances at the '2025 Southeast Asia Tech Seminar' in Bangkok, showcasing innovations such as the Bespoke AI Family Hub with a 32-inch touchscreen and the Bespoke AI Combo Washer and Dryer with a 7-inch touchscreen. The company also presented other AI-integrated products like the 'fully automatic AI bubble' washing machine and the 'Bespoke AI Jet 400W' vacuum cleaner.

articles.title: High-end foam mattress N32 using Icelandic C-Cell announced on the 23rd that it has launched a new p..
articles.author: Lee Yu-Jin
articles.summary: N32 announced the launch of its new product, the 'N32 Motion Bed', a functional electric bed that adjusts angles via remote control. The bed features five segmental structures, safety sensors, and a motion span safety cover cloth, with modes like flat, head tilting, and weightlessness. It also includes Bluetooth connectivity, charging ports, and is compatible with regular frames in super single and large sizes.

articles.title: WhatsApp New Feature Update: Meta-Owned Platform Working on AI-Generated Chat Wallpapers Using Meta AI for Android Users
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: WhatsApp, owned by Meta, is testing a feature that allows users to generate AI-powered chat wallpapers using Meta AI. Beta testers can access the feature in the chat theme settings to apply AI-generated wallpapers to chats, with personalized options for individual conversations available. Users can provide custom text prompts to generate specific wallpaper variations.

articles.title: Prosperity Media launches GEO to future-proof brands in AI-driven search
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Prosperity Media has launched Generative Engine Optimisation (GEO), a new service to help brands remain visible amidst AI-driven search changes. This service will offer optimisations for brands, products and services as well as AI mode, AI overviews and ChatGPT shopping. It ensures clients stay ahead of the curve.

articles.title: Best Shampoos for Oily Scalp and Dry Hair
articles.summary: Deconstruct launched a shampoo combining biotin and keratin to reduce breakage. A dual-action shampoo targets oily scalps and hydrates dry hair, offering 72-hour moisture, and another shampoo infused with Moroccan argan oil repairs damaged hair. A shampoo enriched with silicon boosters offers instant smoothness for frizzy hair, while another with henna and ginseng targets hair fall.

articles.title: Nourishing Lip Balms with Brightening and Repair
articles.summary: LANEIGE introduces a lightweight, non-sticky lip balm with shea butter for a dewy glow. Soultree launches a 100% natural and handmade lip balm using traditional ingredients like hibiscus and honey. Plum offers vegan Candy Melts lip balms with cocoa and shea butter, providing a natural tint.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 & Watch 8 Launch Date
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Watch 8, possibly on July 9, 2025, at the Galaxy Unpacked event. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is rumored to feature an improved hinge, enhanced display technology, a powerful processor, upgraded cameras, and software optimizations. The Galaxy Watch 8 is anticipated to include advanced health sensors, improved battery life, and a sleeker design.

articles.title: DOMINATION: SGA's 29-Point MASTERCLASS Leads Thunder to NBA Glory
articles.summary: WeAreIowa requires users to download the WeAreIowa app to stream WeAreIowa content on their phones, signaling a new digital access method.

articles.title: Injury-Plagued East CRUMBLES as Cade Cunningham PRIMED for Superstar Leap
articles.summary: WeAreIowa introduced the WeAreIowa app. The app allows users to stream WeAreIowa content on their phones, offering a new way to access the service.

articles.title: New Balance's ABZORB 2000 is Already a Sold Out Success, But It's Just Warming Up
articles.author: Ben McKimm
articles.summary: New Balance launched the ABZORB 2000 sneaker, designed by Charlotte Lee, featuring a futuristic design inspired by abandoned NB technology and virtual reality tools. The first release sold out on June 12, 2025, and future collaborations are planned, including one with Joe Freshgoods for Paris Fashion Week.

articles.title: Tiravikant and Bosch Launch ASEAN's First Concept Store
articles.summary: Bosch, in partnership with Tiravikant, launched a new integrated concept store in Bangkok, Thailand, showcasing Bosch's power tools and home appliances. Bosch Power Tools introduced new 18V cordless SKUs, including Industrial and Hydraulic Tools. Bosch Home Appliances presented the Smart Space Tower (Series 8 Washing Machine and Dryer) and the Unlimited 10 Vacuum Cleaner featuring MicroClean technology.

articles.title: Xiaomi YU7 Launch on June 26; Check Expected Specifications and Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Xiaomi is launching its new electric vehicle (EV), the YU7, on June 26, 2025. The YU7 model will have multiple colors and may include a HyperVision Panoramic Display. It could be powered by the Xiaomi HyperEngine V6s Plus and feature the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chip.

articles.title: First look inside Orange Oporto ahead of fast-food restaurant's grand opening
articles.author: Riley Krause
articles.summary: Orange is preparing for the grand opening of its newest fast-food restaurant. This signifies the launch of a new service location.

articles.title: Meghan Markle reveals she's adding rosé to her As Ever brand
articles.author: Briannah Devlin
articles.summary: As Ever is launching its debut Nappa Valley rosé with notes of stone fruit and gentle minerality, available for purchase on July 1st. Additionally, As Ever has introduced a new apricot spread and a limited-edition orange blossom honey. The company also restocked popular items from its debut collection, including herbal teas, flower sprinkles, crepe baking mix, and shortbread cookie mix.

articles.title: Cyberway platform fuels product innovation for global enterprises
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Cyberway is launching the Cyberway Product Innovation Platform for FMCG enterprises. This platform offers AI-powered tools for market opportunity detection, product definition, and agile response, along with efficient project management and data-driven optimization. The platform aims to reduce waste, shorten R&D cycles, and enhance product innovation.

articles.title: WNP Launches All-in-One Hyaluronic Acid Skincare Set, Pioneering a '3-Step Scientific Skincare Method'
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Skincare brand WNP launched the 'All-in-One Hyaluronic Acid Skincare Set' on its website. The set introduces WNP's original 'Three-Step Scientific Skincare Method' and integrates five skincare steps into a streamlined system based on nano-delivery, HTAC thermal water dynamics, 4D hyaluronic acid, and microencapsulation technology.

articles.title: Sony Earbuds: Listen Smarter! 51% Off Music Deals!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Sony has launched the LinkBuds Open, which are open-ear earbuds designed to allow ambient sound to pass through. These earbuds offer up to 8 hours of listening on a single charge and an additional 14 hours from the charging case, and feature an IPX4 rating for splash-proof durability. The LinkBuds Open are aimed at users who want to stay connected to their surroundings while listening to audio.

articles.title: 20 Game-Changing AI Tools Every Small Business Leader Needs Now
articles.author: Bernard Marr
articles.summary: Several companies have recently introduced or updated AI-powered tools for small businesses. Adobe Express is offering a genAI-powered suite for creating marketing materials. Salesforce Agentforce Assistant, formerly Einstein Copilot, provides genAI CRM assistance, and Microsoft 365 Copilot integrates AI into Office tools like Word and Excel. Additionally, Shopify launched Sidekick AI assistant to help with routine tasks like drafting product descriptions as well as in-depth analytics for business insights.

articles.title: Neue Klasse aims to be game-changer for BMW
articles.author: LI FUSHENG
articles.summary: BMW is preparing to launch its Neue Klasse models, including the iX3, in the Chinese market in 2026. The Neue Klasse represents a comprehensive reset for BMW, featuring new design, advanced human-machine interfaces, and sixth-generation electric drive technology, with features co-developed with Chinese tech companies like Alibaba, Huawei, and ByteDance for the Chinese market.

articles.title: Shanghai AI company launches open-source model
articles.author: WANG YING
articles.summary: MiniMax, an AI startup, launched its large-scale open-source reasoning model MiniMax-M1, claiming performance comparable to top competitors. Furthermore, MiniMax introduced a video generation model MiniMax Hailuo 02 and a general intelligent agent MiniMax Agent.

articles.title: We tried the viral 5-star rated hair cream on type 2b and 3b curls
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Curlsmith's Weightless Air Dry Cream is gaining popularity on social media. Shoppers are praising the product. The cream is being recognized for adding definition and bounce to curls.

articles.title: Anyonebot Announces Launch Date for M1: A New Generation of AI Robotic Lawn Mowers
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Anyonebot will launch its M1 AI robotic lawn mower on June 24. The M1 AI robotic lawn mower introduces dual-perception technology combining AI vision with tactile blade sensing. Anyonebot is a technology company specializing in smart home robotics.

articles.title: Battery Tender Expands Product Line at Lowe's, Offering Consumers Additional Industry-Leading Battery Solutions
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: The company has launched its new Charge N Start battery charger and jump starter combo. The product is now available for purchase at Lowe's stores nationwide.

articles.title: DreamCloud Mattress Sale: Save Up To 60% This Week
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: DreamCloud is having a sale on their mattresses, including designs favored by editors. Consumers can upgrade their beds at a reduced price.

articles.title: Joomcy Launches Eco-Conscious Camping Gear Collection Ahead of Peak Outdoor Season
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Joomcy, an e-commerce brand, has launched its new collection of camping gear tailored for modern adventurers. This new product line includes inflatable family tents, portable solar lights, and compact gear, emphasizing freedom, mobility, and environmental care.
